First, let's find out the total number of seats in the auditorium when it's fully filled up. With 8085399 rows of seats having 18 seats per row, we multiply these numbers to get the full capacity seat count. This results as follows:  
Total Seats=Rows*Seats Per Row=> Total_seats=(8085399)*(18)=145536782 seats.

Secondarily considering one fourth of this quantity was taken over by admins (Administrators), hence leaving three quarters which would equate approximately to admin occupancy plus parent/student occupation. Thus calculated like so; Admin Occupied Seats=Full Capacity*(Fraction Taken Up By Admins) => AdminOcc=Total_seats*(1/4). Substituting our previously computed value here yields :   
AdminOcc = 145536782*(1/4)=36384195.5 ~ approx. equals around 3638420 rounded off due its impossibility dealing with half persons! Hence roundoff applied.
